verses.name: Psalms 143:1
verses.text: Hear my prayer, O Lord, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 143:2
verses.text: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.

verses.name: Psalms 143:3
verses.text: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.

verses.name: Psalms 143:4
verses.text: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.
